CustomField.description: Calculates the hour range in which the record was sent through round robin
CustomField.formula: IF( FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 5/24),1) *24) < 12, TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 5/24),1) *24))&" - "& TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 5/24),1) *24)+1)&" AM", TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 5/24),1) *24)-12)&" - "& TEXT(FLOOR ( MOD( RR_Last_Routed__c - ($System.OriginDateTime + 5/24),1) *24)-11)&" PM" )
CustomField.label: Round Robin Timeframe
